heading: Sponsored films.
general-note: This heading is used as a topical heading for works about films produced, subsidized, financed, or otherwise significantly supported by a business, government body, organization, etc.  Works about films that promote or advertise a product, industry, service, organization, etc. are entered under. Promotional films.. When used as topical headings they are subdivided by the appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions..
